cast.name: 安德鲁·W·索尔 Andrew W. Saul

this_title: Making a Killing: The Untold Story of Psychotropic Drugging
trans_title: 精神科药物未曾公开过的真相
introduction: 播放地址：http://www.tudou.com/programs/view/aYbilTsIqD0Psychotropic drugs. It’s the story of big money—drugs that fuel a $330 billion psychiatric industry, without a single cure. The cost in human terms is even greater—these drugs now kill an estimated 42,000 people every year. And the death count keeps rising. Containing more than 175 interviews with lawyers, mental health experts, the families of victims and the survivors themselves, this riveting documentary rips the mask off psychotropic drugging and exposes a brutal but well-entrenched money-making machine.
chinese_title: 精神科药物未曾公开过的真相
foreign_title: Making a Killing: The Untold Story of Psychotropic Drugging
